info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 02 at 9:02AM MST until August 02 at 2:15PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST/NOON PDT/ TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Arizona and Nevada, including the following counties, in northwest Arizona, Mohave. In Nevada, Clark and Lincoln. * WHEN...Until noon MST /noon PDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 902 AM MST /902 AM PDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mesquite, Littlefield, Beaver Dam, Virgin River Gorge, Moapa Valley, Bunkerville, Virgin River Campground and Overton Beach. - This includes the following roads... Interstate 15 in Nevada between mile markers 100 and 120. Interstate 15 in Arizona between mile markers 0 and 29. Mount Trumbull Loop Road between mile markers 1 and 25. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
